title: I'd like to share my daughter's league of legends song.  (she's 3)
body:
My daughter is running around the house right now with a toy ear inspection thingy from her play doctor doc mcstuffins set as a microphone.  I'd like to share her song with you.

"aaaa beeeeeee aaa daaaaaaa and mommy and daddyyyyy and daddy champion gaaaaaaaame

And beat up bad guuuuyyyyyyssss and don't wanna go sleep right nowwwwww

And we eeeaat donuuuuuts so daddy beat up bad guyyyyysssss and championnnnns

And we eeeaatt ceeeereaalllll  and daddy win his gaaaaaaame  And team umi zumi!"



My kids (daughter 3, son 2)  love watching LCS with me on the couch, and so they've picked up terms like "Champions" and "Win the game" and "beat up the bad guys."

I thought it was adorable.
